titles.title: Oh For A Faith That Will Not Sink (familiar tune e

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
O for a faith that will not shrink
Tho' pressed by every foe
That will not tremble
On the brink
Of any earthly woe

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
That will not murmur
Or complain
Beneath the chastening rod
But in the hour
Of grief or pain
Will lean upon its God

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
A Faith that shines
More bright and clear
When tempests
Rage without
That when in danger
Knows no fear
In darkness feels
No doubt

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
That bears unmoved
The world's dread frown
Nor heeds
Its scornful smile
That seas of trouble
Cannot drown
Nor Satan's arts beguile

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Lord give us such
A faith as this
And then whate'er
May come
We'll taste e'en here
The hallowed bliss
Of an eternal home
